member.name: M:InMotionGIT.BusinessRule.Engine.Execute.ApplyRulesForIndependentRuleSet(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Executes the specified independent 'rule set', with the specified arguments.
member.param: An optional set of arguments to use for 'rule set' execution.
member.returns: List of possible errors detected in the execution.

member.name: M:InMotionGIT.BusinessRule.Engine.Execute.ApplyRulesForEntity(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes all the 'rule set' for an entity, using as a parameter the same complete entity.
member.param: Object used to create the entity
member.returns: List of possible errors detected in the execution.

member.name: M:InMotionGIT.BusinessRule.Engine.Execute.ApplyRulesForEntity(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Executes all the 'rule set' for an entity, using as parameters the values of the fields for the entity.
member.param: the values of the fields for the entity.
member.returns: List of possible errors detected in the execution.

the values of the fields for the entity.
